page.title: 08BUS SERVICES FROM GLASSARY
page.content: THE BUS SERVICE FROM GLASSARY IS ON WEDNESDAYS AND SATURDAYS AND IT ONLY GOES AS FAR AS LOCHGILPHEAD, CALLING AT CAIRNBAAN ON THE WAY. ON BOTH DAYS THE BUS LEAVES THE VILLAGE AT 11.15 IN THE MORNING AND RETURNS TO THE VILLAGE AT 2.15 IN THE AFTERNOON. IF ANYONE WISHES TO TRAVEL TO OBAN BY PUBLIC TRANSPORT THEY HAVE TO WALK ABOUT ONE MILE TO{BRIDGEND}WHERE THERE IS A TWICE DAILY BUS SERVICE. THE NEAREST PICK-UP POINT FOR PEOPLE FROM THE VILLAGE WISHING TO TRAVEL TO{ {GLASGOW}OR{CAMPBELTOWN}IS{ {LOCHGILPHEAD. { }THE LOCAL BUS SERVICE IS USED MAINLY BY HOUSEWIVES WHO TRAVEL TO LOCHGILPHEAD TO BUY THERE GROCERIES. MANY PEOPLE IN {GLASSARY}OWN THEIR OWN CARS AND DO NOT RELY ON PUBLIC TRANSPORT.
